QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, CAST(RIGHT(Claim_ID, LEN(Claim_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS visit_occurrence_id, Date_of_procedure AS procedure_date, CASE WHEN Type_of_claim = 'Outpatient' THEN 32859 ELSE 32853 END AS procedure_type_concept_id, CAST('1' + RIGHT(institution_id, LENGTH(institution_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS associated_provider_id, ICD9CM_level1 AS procedure_source_value, actual_point * 10 AS total_paid, 44818592 as CurrencyConceptId FROM {sc}.procedure p JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.Member_ID = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT)
